name: Patient Six
description:
Patient Six

Patients zero through five didn't make it. Now it's your chance to save Patient Six!

Play as a nanobot helping to clear an infectious disease. Navigate through the body on your journey to cure the heart.

Controls: MoveArrow keys or WASD
RestartRSprintShift
